CheckTitle: Ensure the default security group does not allow Internet ingress
Description: The default security group should not expose instances to the Internet. Only trusted networks should be allowed.
Risk: Allowing ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0 on the default security group exposes every instance launched without explicit security groups to the Internet, increasing the risk of compromise.

Recommendation.Text: Remove overly permissive ingress rules from the default security group or restrict them to trusted CIDR ranges only.
